title: Harrowing skins question
body:
Hi, so basically, i've been playing for quite a while but I have barely played when the Harrowing was happening but now I can. My question is: Do they bring back skins like Haunting Nocturne back that you can buy without having to buy the bundle? So like paying 520 rp to get the skin?

Thank you

replies.body:
Not sure! We'll keep our eyes posted on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement, so we recommend doing the same.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
